Title: A Poisonous Promotion
Description:
Guardian! These podlings have been poisoning the lashers, and now they have twisted that mandragora!

If we do not stop it, it will spread the poison to the garden. This must be what had the wildlife in the garden so disturbed. They were on the verge of invasion!

Let us kill it. This is what you have prepared me for--a dire quest!
ObjectivesText: Defeat the Sickened Growth in the Twisting Wood.
PortraitGiverText: The podlings have poked, prodded, and poisoned this mass of plants to produce a perilous opponent.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Dionaessa in the Root-Bound Sanctuary.
